TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlArrayItemAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 表示指定 可以放置在序列化数组中的派生类型的特性。

span.span: Represents an attribute that specifies the derived types that the can place in a serialized array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化或反序列化对象。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 您可以将应用返回一个数组，或提供对某个访问任何公共读/写成员。You can apply the to any public read/write member that returns an array, or provides access to one. 例如，返回一个对象，一个集合，数组的字段，或实现任何类接口。For example, a field that returns an array of objects, a collection, an , or any class that implements the interface. 支持多态性-即，它允许将派生的对象添加到数组。The supports polymorphism--in other words, it allows the to add derived objects to an array. 例如，假设名为的类`Mammal`派生自基类名为`Animal`。For example, suppose a class named `Mammal` is derived from a base class named `Animal`. 此外，假设一个名为`MyAnimals`包含返回的数组的字段`Animal`对象。Further suppose that a class named `MyAnimals` contains a field that returns an array of `Animal` objects. 若要允许进行序列化这两`Animal`和`Mammal`类型，将应用到字段两次，每次指定两个可接受的类型之一。To allow the to serialize both the `Animal` and `Mammal` type, apply the to the field twice, each time specifying one of the two acceptable types. > [!NOTE] > 您可以将应用的多个实例或可以指定可以插入到数组的对象的类型。You can apply multiple instances of the or to specify types of objects that can be inserted into the array. > [!NOTE] > 不支持的序列化的字段或属性返回的接口的数组。The serialization of a field or property that returns an interface or array of interfaces is not supported. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 可以使用单词`XmlArrayItem`而不是较长在代码中。You can use the word `XmlArrayItem` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Group`，其中包含一个名为字段`Employees`返回的数组`Employee`对象。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a field named `Employees` that returns an array of `Employee` objects. 该示例应用到字段，从而指示，它可以插入基的类的对象 (`Employee`) 类型和派生的类类型 (`Manager`) 到序列化数组。The example applies the to the field, thereby instructing the that it can insert objects of both the base class (`Employee`) type and derived class type (`Manager`) into the serialized array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Transportation`，其中包含一个名为字段`MyVehicles`返回的数组`Vehicle`对象。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 该示例应用到字段，从而允许要插入的实例`Car`类，该类派生自`Vehicle`类中的，数组中。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the XML element generated in the XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载设置属性。This overload sets the property. 如果您希望生成的 XML 元素，不同于该成员的标识符名称，请使用此重载。Use this overload if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 包括命名空间的 XML 文档可以包含多个版本的元素名称。An XML document that includes namespaces can contain more than one version of an element name. 有关详细信息，请参见 属性。For details, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Transportation`，其中包含一个名为字段`MyVehicles`返回的数组`Vehicle`对象。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 该示例应用到字段，从而允许要插入的实例`Car`类，该类派生自`Vehicle`类中的，数组中。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. 在应用特性时，该示例设置属性使用`elementName`参数。While applying the attribute, the example sets the property using the `elementName` parameter. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载设置和属性。This overload sets the and the properties. 如果您希望生成的 XML 元素，不同于该成员的标识符名称，请使用此重载。Use this overload if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 包括命名空间的 XML 文档可以包含多个版本的元素名称。An XML document that includes namespaces can contain more than one version of an element name. 有关详细信息，请参见 属性。For details, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Transportation`，其中包含一个名为字段`MyVehicles`返回的数组`Vehicle`对象。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 该示例应用到字段，从而允许要插入的实例`Car`类，该类派生自`Vehicle`类中的，数组中。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. 在应用特性时，该示例设置属性使用`elementName`参数，并属性使用`type`参数。While applying the attribute, the example sets the property using the `elementName` parameter, and the property using the `type` parameter. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的 XML 数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML data type of the generated XML element.

value.span: XML 架构定义 (XSD) 数据类型。

span.span: An XML schema definition (XSD) data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了 XML 架构简单数据类型及其.NET 等效项。The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their .NET equivalents. 为 XML 架构`base64Binary`并`hexBinary`数据类型使用的数组对象，并将应用与属性设置为"base64Binary"或"hexBinary"根据需要。For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of objects, and apply an with the property set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. 为 XML 架构`time`并`date`数据类型，使用键入并应用与设置为"日期"或"时间"。For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 对于映射到一个字符串，每个 XML 架构类型，将应用于使用其属性设置为 XML 架构类型。For every XML Schema type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XML Schema type. 但是，这不会更改序列化格式，仅该成员的架构。However, this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 属性是区分大小写，因此必须将其设置与 XML 架构数据类型之一完全。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types. > [!NOTE] > 将二进制数据作为 XML 元素是更有效，然后将其作为 XML 特性。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient then passing it as an XML attribute. 有关 XML 架构数据类型的详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会文档[XML 架构第 2 部分：数据类型](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)。For more information about XML Schema data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium document [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/). |XSD 数据类型XSD data type|.NET 数据类型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|数组对象Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |实体ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|数组对象Array of objects| |IdID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |整数integer|| |语言language|| |longlong|| |nameName|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |durationduration|| |stringstring|| |shortshort|| |时间time|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`PurchaseOrder`。The following example serializes a class named `PurchaseOrder`. 多个实例类应用于三个成员和每个实例的属性设置为数组中允许的类型。Several instances of the class are applied to three members, and the property for each instance is set to a type allowed in the array. [!code-cpp[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/arrayitem.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/arrayitem.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/arrayitem.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the generated XML element.

value.span: 生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the generated XML element.
The default is the member identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定如果您希望生成的 XML 元素，不同于该成员的标识符名称。Specify an if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 您可以设置相同创建名为成员对多个类成员如果生成的 XML 文档使用 XML 命名空间来区分名称相同的值。You can set the same value to more than one class member if the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between identically named members. 有关如何在 XML 文档中使用命名空间和前缀的名称的详细信息，请参阅类。For details about how to use namespaces and prefixed names in the XML document, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性`Vehicle`并`Car`类-从而更改的 XML 元素的名称，为这些类生成。The following example sets the property for the `Vehicle` and `Car` class--thereby changing the names of XML elements that the generates for those classes. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示生成的 XML 元素的名称是否是限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the name of the generated XML element is qualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否限定 XML 元素名称，基于 World Wide Web Consortium 规范[XML 中的命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/)。The property determines whether an XML element name is qualified, based on the World Wide Web Consortium specification [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/). 如果属性设置为任何值，尝试设置属性设置为`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`将引发异常。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 默认值`XmlSchemaForm.None`，指示检查 XML 文档以确定是否限定命名空间的架构。The default value, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 对于元素，检查架构元素属性的值`elementFormDefault`。For elements, the checks the value of the schema-element attribute `elementFormDefault`. 对于属性，它会检查架构元素属性的值`attributeFormDefault`。For attributes, it checks the value of the schema-element attribute `attributeFormDefault`. 例如，以下 XML 架构指示`Name`限定的元素，而`Number`是非限定的元素。For example, the following XML Schema indicates that the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性`Vehicle`类来`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`，和属性`Car`类到`XmlSchemaForm.Qualified`。The following example sets the property for the `Vehicle` class to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`, and the property for the `Car` class to `XmlSchemaForm.Qualified`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 属性设置为 ，并且指定 值。

span.span: The property is set to and a value is specified.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否必须将成员序列化为 属性设置为 的 XML 空标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member as an empty XML tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 生成 特性，则为 ；否则为 ，且不生成实例。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, , and no instance is generated.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档以显式指示缺少指定元素的内容。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 此类元素包含的属性`xsi:nil`设置为`true`。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅标题为 World Wide Web Consortium 规范[XML 架构第 1 部分：结构](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/)。For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium specification titled [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/). 如果属性是`true`，则`xsi:nil`已设置为的类成员生成属性`null`。If the property is `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如，如果将一个名为字段`MyStringArray`到`null`，则生成以下 XML 代码。For example, if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果属性是`false`，会生成任何 XML 元素。If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated. > [!NOTE] > 无法应用属性绑定到成员类型为值类型，因为值类型不能包含`null`。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Group`，其中包含一个名为字段`Employees`返回的数组`Employee`对象。The following example serializes a class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Employees` that returns an array of `Employee` objects. 名为第二个类`Manager`派生自`Employee`。A second class named `Manager` derives from `Employee`. 规定可以插入两`Employee`和`Manager`数组中的对象。An specifies that the can insert both `Employee` and `Manager` objects into the array. 该示例设置属性，从而通知不能生成`xsi:nil`数组中的属性对象设置为`null`。The example sets the property, thereby telling the not to generate the `xsi:nil` attribute objects in the array set to `null`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the generated XML element.

value.span: 生成的 XML 元素的命名空间。

span.span: The namespace of the generated XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性符合 World Wide Web Consortium 规范[XML 中的命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/)。The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium specification [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/). 若要创建要在 XML 文档和关联的前缀中使用的命名空间，必须创建，其中包含所有前缀和命名空间对。To create namespaces to use in the XML document and associated prefixes, you must create an that contains all the prefix and namespace pairs. 为每个设置的命名空间必须包含在。The namespace you set for each must be contained in the . 当生成文档时，它正确加上前缀每个数组项的元素名称。When the generates the document, it correctly prefixes the element name for each array item. ## Examples 下面的示例应用，并设置属性。The following example applies an and sets the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int NestingLevel { int get(); void set(int value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置受 影响的 XML 元素的层次结构中的级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the level in a hierarchy of XML elements that the affects.

value.span: 数组的数组中的索引集从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of a set of indexes in an array of arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 文档可以包含 XML 元素层次的结构。An XML document can contain hierarchies of XML elements. 若要表示这一层次结构，请使用数组的数组。To represent such a hierarchy, an array of arrays is used. 在这样的数组，每个索引表示层次结构中的级别。In such an array, each index represents a level in the hierarchy. 因此，应用时，才使用属性返回数组的数组的字段。Therefore, the property is only used when applying an to a field that returns an array of arrays. 当应用特性时，指定通过设置特性会影响哪些层次结构级别。When applying the attribute, specify which hierarchy level the attribute affects by setting the . 第一个索引始终具有值为 0;因此它取决于您要设置其--而无需值应用于第一个数组索引。The first index always has the value of 0; therefore it is optional to set its --an without a value is applied to the first array index. 仅后续对象需要指定 （为 1、 2、 3，依此类推） 的值。Only the subsequent objects require values specified (as 1, 2, 3, and so forth). ## Examples 下面的示例应用三个属性到数组的数组。The following example applies three attributes to an array of arrays. 以指定的数组的每个特性应用于，属性设置为数组的索引。To specify which of the arrays each attribute applies to, the property is set to the index of the arrays. [!code-cpp[NestingLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NestingLevel/cpp/nestinglevel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NestingLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NestingLevel/CS/nestinglevel.cs#1)]

member this.Type : Type with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置数组中允许的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type allowed in an array.
A that is allowed in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性重写为指定类型的公共字段或公共读/写属性值。Use the property to specify an overridden type for a public field or public read/write property value. 如果字段或属性将返回类型的数组，将应用的多个实例到字段或属性。If a field or property returns an array of type , apply multiple instances of the to the field or property. 对于每个实例，设置属性设置为一种可以插入到数组的对象。For each instance, set the property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array. 如果数组包含仅基元数据类型，不需要应用。If an array contains only primitive types, you do not need to apply the . 默认情况下，生成一系列元素，每个都具有相同的元素名称，每个值，但每个元素的类型设置为 XML 架构数据类型。By default, the generates a series of elements, each with the same element name, for each value, but the type of each element is set to the XML Schema data type. 例如，以下代码：For example, the following code: ``` ' Visual Basic code Public Class Arrays Public XSDTypes ()As Object= New Object(){"one", 2, 3.0} End Class // C# code public class MyArray{ // No XmlArrayItemAttribute is applied. public object[] XSDTypes= new object[]{"one", 2, 3.2}; } ``` 此 XML 中的结果：results in this XML: ``` ``` 但是，如果指定使用.NET 的类型名称生成对于每个基元类型，每个值的元素名称的属性。However, if you specify the property for each primitive type, the element name for each value is generated using the .NET type name. 有关此代码示例：For example this code: ``` ' Visual Basic code Public Class Arrays _ Public PrimitiveTypes () As Object = New Object(){"one", 2, 3.0} End Class // C# code public class Arrays{ [XmlArrayItem(typeof(string))] [XmlArrayItem(typeof(int))] [XmlArrayItem(typeof(double))] public object [] PrimitiveTypes = new object[]{"one", 2, 3.0}; } ``` 此 XML 中的结果：results in this XML: ``` one 2 3 ``` ## Examples 下面的示例序列化对象的数组。The following example serializes an array of objects. 返回数组的字段具有两个实例。The field that returns the array is attributed with two instances. 每个实例指示接受指定数组中。Each instance instructs the to accept the specified in the array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
